subject: UEFA Champions League (Soccer)
lead_paragraph: When Raúl González moved from Real Madrid to Schalke last summer, it was fair to assume that Champions League finals were a thing of his past, but his team just keeps marching on.
snippet: When Raúl González moved from Real Madrid to Schalke last summer, it was fair to assume that Champions League finals were a thing of his past, but his team just keeps marching on.
